oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from John A. Crutchfield to L. M. Crutchfield
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from John A. Crutchfield to L. M. Crutchfield written in a camp near Tupelo, Mississippi. Crutchfield states that cavalry is running to Corinth and he expects to go up there soon." He also mentions rumors that "Yanks" are plundering the Confederacy.
